column3: NACK\nit's just that, the total amount of coins in UTXOs, created through whatever means (most UTXOs will likely have been created as output of normal transactions); involving mining here is unnecessary
I don't think this is true. It is the upper bound of coins that can be theoretically spent, which is lower than the total of mined coins.
And "total of mined coins" is ambiguous too: https://www.reddit.com/r/Bitcoin/comments/djw5z9/z/f4962kr
